title: How much distance should we leave when we cross before a praying person? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript:
[Questioner] from Bangladesh Sheikh if a person 
is praying without a Sutra and I have to pass   in front of him what's the minimum distance 
I have to keep when walking in front of him   if a person is praying without a Sutra a screen 
or a visor in front of him to block people from   passing in front of him his jurisdiction 
is the place where he places his forehead   on so between his feet and the place of 
prostration this is his Sanctuary that   you must not pass if you pass beyond that spot 
by maybe 10 centimeters there's no problem in   that because it's his fault and a mistake and 
you have no fault in this at all insha Allah [Music] and have you ever taken a counseling session with 
me go to my website and you will find counseling   sessions and apply for one if you can afford 
it that's good for you if you cannot you're   entitled for one free session and this is for 
everybody if they can affirm by Allah that they   cannot afford it because they're poor I'll give 
them one free session without a problem a full   half an hour so come to me and let's speak 
about it inshallah within the following two   days or three days I will uh try and seek Allah's 
guidance to solve the problem once and for Allah
